products.title: Purple Sunset Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: This rich purple venetian blind will add a touch of drama and spectacle to your surroundings so you can stamp your personality on your home. The aluminium slats let in lots of light and survive just about anywhere so if you want to add some pizzaz to your bathroom or vibrancy to this rich purple venetian blind will add a touch of drama and spectacle to your surroundings so you can stamp your personality on your home.

products.title: Purple Sunset Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: This deep and delightful purple sunset blind will give your conservatory some real vibrancy and life. It has a glossy finish to the robust aluminium slats that will ensure a bold and magnificent look.

products.title: Duoshade Plume Perfect Fit Thermal Blind
products.description: The brightness of a white blind with the slick modern vibe of a grey, this blind is perfect for making a space feel bright, airy and uplifted. Built from honeycomb pockets, lined internally with foil, this fabric will trap the air to insulate the room, deaden sound and provide the brightness of a white blind with the slick modern vibe of a grey, this blind is perfect for making a space feel bright, airy and uplifted.

products.title: Duoshade Plume Perfect Fit Thermal Blind
products.description: Grey, its the colour of the moment, but that doesnt mean that its just a passing phase. Not at all. This perfect fit duoshade plume pleated blind is a classic in the making. Its perfect colour is soft, warm and simple. And with characteristics like that, its certainly a bli grey, its the colour of the moment, but that doesnt mean that its just a passing phase.
